name: DRINK THE MILK
description:
DRINK THE MILK (1.0.2)

An horror game by tabrixx9.

5 endings, which one will you lead to?  Drink the milk to understand the secrets. Don't want to? THEN IT WILL HAVE CONSEQUENCES.  Credits: Kage (Kami) for ideas  (and eventually skell heh)

Short horror game made in a day on Clickteam Fusion. #MadeWithFusion!

gamejolt version
